sentences.sentence: Russian drone attacks on Wednesday night injured six people in Odessa and several residential buildings and a warehouse were damaged.

sentences.sentence: Kyiv announced that air defense systems in the Odessa and Mykolaiv region shot down 11 of 14 drones launched by Moscow.

sentences.sentence: In a statement, the Ukrainian Air Force said that the Russian forces had used Iranian-designed Shade drones.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Kyiv continues to call on its Western allies to reinforce its air defence systems.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Some Russian media claimed that it was sparked by a Ukrainian drone attack. The US ambassador to NATO says Hungary will ratify NATO membership for Sweden soon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Hungary, alongside Turkey, has been blocking Sweden's NATO bid for over a year and a half, but parliament in Ankara recently approved the Swedish bid after ongoing negotiations with the US, Sweden and the rest of the alliance. In a surprise move earlier this week, leaving Hungary the last NATO member withholding the issue, Budapest delay has been a source of great frustration within the alliance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: We do have assurances from Hungary that they are going to move forward and get this done.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Hungarians understand, Prime Minister Orán understands we are all stronger with Sweden inside this alliance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It's good for Sweden and it's good for the NATO alliance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: This is an important move for Putin to signal to him that he miscalculated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: He thought NATO would have a weak response to going into Ukraine, but in fact the alliance ultimately is stronger and more united than ever before.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, the ambassador said European allies should be assured that U.S. support for NATO is strong, despite widely held fears if Donald Trump is re-elected in November, America will abandon the alliance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Donald Trump reportedly told EU Commission President Ursula von der Leyen back in 2020, you need to understand that if Europe is under attack, we will never come to help you and support you. US Ambassador to NATO says there may be a difference between what a candidate says on the campaign trail. There's always the difference between what candidates say on the campaign trail and what actually transpires should they assume a leadership role or secure a particular position that they're running for so i think at this point it's it's premature to make certain conclusions i mean let's first and foremost see who wins the u.s election and take it from there the The ambassador also says that U.S. President Joe Biden is concentrating on passing the $60 billion of military aid for Ukraine through U.S. Congress as soon as possible.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The European Commission has opened its Strategic dialogue on the future of agriculture.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This dialogue, announced in September, is taking place at a time of growing anger in the farming world in many member states.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The president of the European Commission has gathered around her some 30 organizations representing the entire food chain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: For Ursula von der Leyen, this meeting is an opportunity to send a message to the industry just a few months ahead of the European elections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Europe has the healthiest and the highest quality food in the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Our farmers operate on a daily basis in a very competitive global market. You are often the most vulnerable part in the value chain and of course you deserve a fair remuneration. This meeting was a first contact. The talks are due to continue until the summer. The aim is to discuss farmers income but also the sustainable development of the sector and the competitiveness of breeders and producers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Professionals are concerned about the EU's environmental standards and competition from world markets.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: You know the farmers are today very squeezed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And they need to have a change from this top-down approach that I think we have seen to a more bottom-up approach and that one size doesn't fit all. I think it's urgent that there's both more money and more basic support and less rules. The Commission acknowledges that the Union has lost 4 million farms in 10 years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The future of the sector must therefore be mapped out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's not going to bring any solutions tomorrow or the day after tomorrow, but I do think it has the perspective of creating a movement for more clarity for what agriculture should look like in 2050.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But I hope that the recommendations which should be the outcome to the next commission help the next commission with creating perspective for young farmers so that we as young farmers can choose, okay, do we want to continue in this sector or not, or am I going to do a different job which probably pays more with less work?" Next month, the Commission is due to present its climate objectives for 2040.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This will be the first indication for farmers of the direction the Commission wishes to take and whether it intends to listen to the sector. More than 2,200 people have been victims of sexual abuse by church staff in Germany.

sentences.sentence: An independent reporting to sexual abuse in a Protestant church in Germany says there have been thousands of victims over the past decades and that the known cases may be just the tip of the iceberg.
